author: Reuters Editorial
title: Seychelles confirms two coronavirus cases: health commissioner
description: The Seychelles confirmed two coronavirus cases on Saturday, the country's health commissioner said.
content:
(Reuters) - The Seychelles confirmed two coronavirus cases on Saturday, the country’s health commissioner said. 
Two Italian citizens visiting the country tested positive, Jude Gedeon said. 
Reporting by Giulia Paravicini; Editing by Catherine Evans
